meanings.definition: A joint of a finger when the fist is closed.
meanings.sent1: She accidentally hit the table with her knuckle.
meanings.sent2: He cracked his knuckle before starting the game.
meanings.sent3: The knuckle on his hand looked like a small bump.
meanings.sent4: Her knuckle knocked on the door softly.
meanings.sent5: The knuckle felt sore after the fall.

meanings.definition: A part of a hinge through which a pin or rivet passes.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic tightened the knuckle of the door hinge.
meanings.sent2: The old cabinet door creaked at the knuckle.
meanings.sent3: The knuckle of the hinge seemed to wink at me.
meanings.sent4: The knuckle of the hinge held the door firmly in place.
meanings.sent5: The rusty knuckle of the hinge needed oiling.
